title: Curry closes, Horford triggered
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Golden State Warriors game 4 win over the Memphis Grizzlies. Steph Curry struggled in the first half but closed out the game with big free throws. Why the absence of Ja was a bigger deal than Curry’s close out. Plus, the Boston Celtics get a big game 4 win to tie the series vs the Milwaukee Bucks. Al Horford showed out and had a career night. The guys tell you why it’s even more impressive because of who he did it against. Also, Suns take on the Mavericks in an evened series. Find out which player needs to step up to take the series lead. And Tom Brady an NFL analyst? Find out what’s next for the G.O.A.T. All that and more.
